required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Data Registry of Intensive Care Unit (ICU) Siamitra and Intensive Care Unit (ICU) Salad-Samung
clinical_study.official_title: Data Registry of ICU Siamitra and ICU Salad-Samung

brief_summary.textblock: As general surgical intensive care units of the biggest tertiary referral university of Thailand with more than 1,000 admissions/year. Recently, more complicated perioperative care surgical patients were accepted with high complications and resource utilization. Good data registration was needed to provide information for quality improvement and resource allocation. This prospective observational (crosssectional) study was designed to register patient > 18 years who will be admitted to these ICUs for 1 years to explore the adequacy of these ICUs services, resource utilization (ICU length of stay and ventilator day), ICU complications and adverse outcome /ICU readmission within 72 hours after discharging from ICU.

primary_outcome.description: Incidence and factors associated with prolonged ICU stay

secondary_outcome.measure: ICU complication, resource utilization and adverse events/ICU readmission within 72 hours after discharging from ICU
secondary_outcome.description: ICU complication, resource utilization and adverse events/ICU admission within 72 hours after discharging from ICU
All unplanned ICU Admission (from OR and from floor)

secondary_outcome.measure: outcome of complications occurring intraoperative and admitting to ICU
secondary_outcome.description: all complication including: intraoperative cardiac arrest, hypotension

secondary_outcome.measure: sepsis and septic shock on ICU admission
secondary_outcome.description: incidence, clinical course and outcome of surgical septic shock admitting to ICU

arm_group.description: Prolonged ICU stay Unplanned ICU admission Complication/adversel during ICU admission Result of intraoperative complications and admission to ICU

study_pop.textblock: Adult (> 18 years), admitting to ICU Siamitra and ICU Salad-Samung

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age > 18 years
- Surgical patients
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient undergoing cardiothoracic surgery, traumatic surgery, neurosurgery
- Undergoing transplant surgery

facility.name: ICU Siamitra and ICU Salad-Samung, Siriraj Hospital, Mahidol University
ICU Siamitra and ICU Salad-Samung, Siriraj Hospital

results_reference.citation: Capuzzo M, Moreno RP, Alvisi R. Admission and discharge of critically ill patients. Curr Opin Crit Care. 2010 Oct;16(5):499-504. doi: 10.1097/MCC.0b013e32833cb874. Review.
